Do you have any question? Feel free to r: Any questions? Feel free to reach out.
Votre courrier lu, analysé et résumé par: Your mail read, analyzed and summarized by AI.
Scannez vos documents, laissez l'IA les: Scan your documents, let AI analyze them and get a personalized voice summary with Nova, your smart assistant.
Klariya utilise l'intelligence artificie: Klariya uses artificial intelligence to scan, analyze and summarize your documents. No need to read every letter: Nova gives you a clear and natural voice summary.
Rapide, intelligent et toujours à jour: Fast, smart and always up to date
Klariya détecte automatiquement le type: Klariya automatically detects the document type, extracts key information and alerts you before every deadline. All in a simple and intuitive app.
Prenez en photo vos documents ou importe: Take a photo of your documents or import them. AI automatically extracts text, deadlines and amounts.
Écoutez un résumé naturel de vos documen: Listen to a natural summary of your documents with Nova, your AI-powered voice assistant.
Klariya détecte automatiquement les date: Klariya automatically detects deadlines in your documents and sends you reminders via push notifications and email. Bills, taxes, admin mail — everything is tracked for you.
Téléchargez Klariya et commencez à simpl: Download Klariya and start simplifying your mail today. 7-day free trial, no commitment.
Prenez en photo votre courrier ou import: Take a photo of your mail or import a PDF. Klariya's AI analyzes the document in seconds: it detects the type (bill, taxes, contract…), extracts the amount, deadline and key info. You can then listen to a voice summary with Nova.
Oui. Vos documents sont chiffrés de bout: Yes. Your documents are end-to-end encrypted and stored on secure servers in Europe. We never share your data with third parties. You can delete your documents at any time.
Quels types de documents sont pris en ch: What types of documents are supported?
Klariya reconnaît les factures, les avis: Klariya recognizes bills, tax notices, bank statements, administrative mail, contracts, certificates and more. The AI continuously improves to cover new document types.
Nova est votre assistante vocale intégré: Nova is your built-in voice assistant. She reads you a clear and natural summary of each scanned document, as if someone was explaining your mail to you. Handy when you don't have time to read everything.
Klariya propose un essai gratuit de 7 jo: Klariya offers a 7-day free trial with all features. Then you can choose between a limited free plan or a premium subscription for unlimited scans, voice summaries and reminders.
Quand Klariya détecte une date limite da: When Klariya detects a deadline in a document (bill, taxes, renewal…), it automatically creates a reminder. You receive a push notification and an email before the deadline so you never forget.
